Messages.M3: Are you sure you want to return the items ?
Messages.M5: This is the first item in the Count List.
Messages.M6: There are no more items in the Count List.
Messages.M7: This is the first item in the Picking List.
Messages.M8: There are no more items in the Picking List.
Messages.M9: Items with uncounted location. Select OK to return to the list.
Messages.M10: This is wrong item. Please try again.
Messages.M11: There are no count lists to be counted.
Messages.M12: Close list for today? Pressing YES will update the stock file.
Messages.M14: Item not on Planner. Check controller to confirm item details.
Messages.M16: Replace SEL with new SEL. Complete Price Check with new SEL.
Messages.M17: This price check will not be counted towards weekly target.
Messages.M18: Price Increase not actioned. Please advise Team Manager.
Messages.M19: There are no items to View.
Messages.M21: SEL and Product Code do not match.
Messages.M22: Maximum of 9 SELs can be requested.
Messages.M23: Excess stock in back shop. Please put stock to Sales Floor.
Messages.M25: Full Price check required. Please scan product code.
Messages.M26: Please enter 3 digit User ID and 3 digit Password.
Messages.M28: Data from previous session available. Do you want to download?
Messages.M29: To download data dock the device and select OK.
Messages.M30: Data from previous session is from another user. Select YES to download or NO to delete.
Messages.M31: Are you sure you want to delete the data available from other user?
Messages.M32: Data in the device is not the latest. Dock the device and get the updated data.
Messages.M33: Please ensure that the device has been docked correctly.
Messages.M34: Unable to download data to the controller.Please retry.
Messages.M35: Failed in Crash Recovery. Data lost.
Messages.M37: Type in your till user ID and password then press 'Sign On'. If you make a mistake press 'Del' to delete last key or 'Clr' to start again.
Messages.M38: Another user created this list. Do you want to continue?
Messages.M39: Are you sure you want to quit?
Messages.M40: Are you sure you wish to quit from current list?
Messages.M41: SEL print request queued for all modules.
Messages.M42: SEL print request queued for the all items in the module.
Messages.M43: The Print request is queued and will be printed when device is docked.
Messages.M44: The list has already been picked and is no longer available.
Messages.M45: You entered zero. Is this correct?
Messages.M46: Data available. Do you want to download?
Messages.M47: SEL and Product code does not match for Price Check.
Messages.M48: Price Error. Replacement SEL will be queued.
Messages.M49: Zero Fill Quantity entered. Count Assumed.
Messages.M54: Items with uncounted location. Check "View" for items.
Messages.M55: Dock the device to get the latest active data.
Messages.M56: Application has been recovered from crash. Please dock the device to download the data available.
Messages.M57: Unable to get data from controller. Please contact Support Help Desk.
Messages.M58: Please dock the device to get the latest data.
Messages.M59: Failed to update data. Please retry. If the problem persists contact Support Help Desk.
Messages.M60: Could not connect to the controller. Please retry. If the problem persists contact Support Help Desk.
Messages.M62: You are already in Planner.Please Quit from Item Info to return to Planner.
Messages.M63: You are already in Item Info.Please Quit from Planner to return to Item Info.
Messages.M64: No further occurrence of this item in the list.
Messages.M66: Zero Shelf Quantity entered. Count Assumed.
Messages.M67: No previous occurrence of this item in the list
Messages.M68: Reference data update is incomplete. Please contact Support Help Desk.
Messages.M69: You have scanned SEL.Please scan Product Code.
Messages.M70: No module available for this category.
Messages.M71: Another instance of the application is already active. Please close it and retry.
Messages.M72: Are you sure you wish to LOGOFF?
Messages.M73: You have selected to print SELs for all items in the module. Do you want to continue?
Messages.M74: You have selected to print SELs for all modules in the planner. Do you want to continue?
Messages.M75: Error in writing data to file.
Messages.M76: This item is multisited, please select a location before pressing GAP.
Messages.M77: This item is multisited, please select a location before pressing GAP. Please scan SEL to continue.

Messages.M81: Please make sure that wider stationery is used for printing labels for food items.
Messages.M82: If Test Label did not print correctly, please check printer and retry OR Sign Off, Sign On and retry.
Messages.M83: Mobile Printer NOT detected. Sign Off, re-attach printer and Sign On again.
Messages.M84: Label Template file is missing. Please contact the Service Desk.
Messages.M85: Quantity value cannot be greater than 9. Please re-enter.
